ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] hate + new favorite mob
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hrm - that mob had been slated (named as a mimic ) for Unrest, pre-release.  I guess they decided to recycle it for Hate... Talies the Wanderer
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:14 AM 4/12/00 -0700, you wrote:
>I have a new favorite mob in the game, new in poh: a haunted chest.
>
> Looks like a big box with a lid that has big teeth. When it attacks it
>leaps at you, the lid opening and closing like its chomping, it sounds
>like someone slamming a trunk lid shot.
>
> The call of "please do not taunt the luggage Tork" had me laughing in RL
>after I got chain summoned about 7x in a row. :)


Hrm - that mob had been slated (named as a "mimic") for Unrest,
pre-release. I guess they decided to recycle it for Hate...

Talies the Wanderer
